languages.text: "Как новенькие, шерин". {n}Джай иронично кривится, потирая блеклый {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмент{/g}, заменяющий горло и легкие. Словно не веря тому, что тот {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}снова стал частью ее тела{/d}.{/n} "Нет, правда. Дышать могу, кровью больше не харкаю в лицо кому ни попадя... Одним словом, шерин, выручил{mf||а} ты меня снова. Спасибо... Уж я постараюсь отплатить добром за добро".

traits.locale_text: "Как новенькие, шерин". {n}Джай иронично кривится, потирая блеклый {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмент{/g}, заменяющий горло и легкие. Словно не веря тому, что тот снова стал частью ее тела.{/n} "Нет, правда. Дышать могу, кровью больше не харкаю в лицо кому ни попадя... Одним словом, шерин, выручил{mf||а} ты меня снова. Спасибо... Уж я постараюсь отплатить добром за добро".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}once again part of her body{/d}.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."
languages.original_text: "Как новенькие, шерин". {n}Джай иронично кривится, потирая блеклый {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмент{/g}, заменяющий горло и легкие. Словно не веря тому, что тот {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}снова стал частью ее тела{/d}.{/n} "Нет, правда. Дышать могу, кровью больше не харкаю в лицо кому ни попадя... Одним словом, шерин, выручил{mf||а} ты меня снова. Спасибо... Уж я постараюсь отплатить добром за добро".

traits.locale_text: "Good as new, shereen." {n}Jae scrunches her face ironically, rubbing the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that is replacing her lungs and throat. As if refusing to believe it once again became a part of her body.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I am no longer coughing up blood in people's faces... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good as new, shereen." {n}Jae scrunches her face ironically, rubbing the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that is replacing her lungs and throat. As if refusing to believe it once again became a part of her body.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I am no longer coughing up blood in people's faces... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

As if she can't quite believe that it is once again part of her body.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is once again part of her body.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}once again part of her body{/d}.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “就像新的一样好，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊不无讽刺地扬起了眉毛，揉着替代了她的肺与咽喉的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，仿佛还不能完全相信这些东西{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}再次回到了她的身体{/d}。{/n}“不过老实说，我又可以呼吸了，也不会把血咳到别人脸上了……你又帮了我个忙，亲爱的。谢谢你……我会尽我所能，用实际行动来报答你。”
languages.original_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}once again part of her body{/d}.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: “就像新的一样好，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊不无讽刺地扬起了眉毛，揉着替代了她的肺与咽喉的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，仿佛还不能完全相信这些东西也成为了她身体的一部分。{/n}“不过老实说，我又可以呼吸了，也不会把血咳到别人脸上了……你又帮了我个忙，亲爱的。谢谢你……我会尽我所能，用实际行动来报答你。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded augmentation that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is once again part of her body.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."

languages.text: «Como nueva, shereen». {n}Jae levanta una ceja con ironía mientras toca el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumento{/g} desteñido que ha reemplazado sus pulmones y su garganta, como si no pudiera creer que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}vuelve a formar parte de su cuerpo{/d}.{/n} «No, en serio. Puedo respirar y no toso sangre a la cara de nadie... Ha vuelto a salvarme, shereen. Gracias... haré todo lo posible por devolverle el favor».
languages.original_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}once again part of her body{/d}.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: «Como nueva, shereen». {n}Jae levanta una ceja con ironía mientras toca el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumento{/g} desteñido que ha reemplazado sus pulmones y su garganta, como si no pudiera creer que vuelve a formar parte de su cuerpo.{/n} «No, en serio. Puedo respirar y no toso sangre a la cara de nadie... Ha vuelto a salvarme, shereen. Gracias... haré todo lo posible por devolverle el favor».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「新品同様さ」{n}ジェイは皮肉っぽく眉をひそめながら、肺と喉の代わりになった色あせた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強装置{/g}をさすりながら言う。まるで、それが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}再び自分の体の一部{/d}となったことが信じられないかのように。{/n}「いいえ、正直さ。息はできるし、もう人の顔を見て血を吐くこともない…あんたのおかげだよ、シャリーン。ありがとう…恩返しができるように頑張らないとね」
languages.original_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}once again part of her body{/d}.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: 「新品同様さ」{n}ジェイは皮肉っぽく眉をひそめながら、肺と喉の代わりになった色あせた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強装置{/g}をさすりながら言う。まるで、それが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}再び自分の体の一部{/d}となったことが信じられないかのように。{/n}「いいえ、正直さ。息はできるし、もう人の顔を見て血を吐くこともない…あんたのおかげだよ、シャリーン。ありがとう…恩返しができるように頑張らないとね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "So gut wie neu, Shereen"{n}, sagt Jae mit einem ironischen Runzeln ihrer Brauen – und reibt sich dabei die verblasste {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g}, die ihre Lungen und ihre Kehle ersetzt hat. Als könnte sie nicht ganz glauben, dass sie {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}wieder Teil ihres Körpers ist{/d}.{/n} "Nein, ehrlich. Ich kann atmen und ich huste den Leuten kein Blut mehr ins Gesicht ... Ihr habt mich wieder einmal sehr anständig behandelt, Shereen. Danke ... Ich werde mein Bestes tun, um mich zu revanchieren."
languages.original_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}once again part of her body{/d}.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: "So gut wie neu, Shereen"{n}, sagt Jae mit einem ironischen Runzeln ihrer Brauen — und reibt sich dabei die verblasste {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentation{/g}, die ihre Lungen und ihre Kehle ersetzt hat. Als könnte sie nicht ganz glauben, dass sie wieder Teil ihres Körpers ist.{/n} "Nein, ehrlich. Ich kann atmen und ich huste den Leuten kein Blut mehr ins Gesicht ... Ihr habt mich wieder einmal sehr anständig behandelt, Shereen. Danke ... Ich werde mein Bestes tun, um mich zu revanchieren."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ils sont comme neufs, shereen, » {n}répond Jae en levant un sourcil d'un air ironique. Elle frotte l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} ternie qui remplace ses poumons et sa gorge, comme si elle avait du mal à croire qu'elle {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}fait à nouveau partie de son corps{/d}.{/n} « Je suis sincère. Je respire normalement, sans cracher du sang au visage des gens... Une fois encore, je vous dois une fière chandelle, shereen. Merci... Je ferai de mon mieux pour vous rendre la pareille. »
languages.original_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}once again part of her body{/d}.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont comme neufs, shereen, » {n}répond Jae en levant un sourcil d'un air ironique. Elle frotte l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} ternie qui remplace ses poumons et sa gorge, comme si elle avait du mal à croire qu'elle fait à nouveau partie de son corps.{/n} « Je suis sincère. Je respire normalement, sans cracher du sang au visage des gens... Une fois encore, je vous dois une fière chandelle, shereen. Merci... Je ferai de mon mieux pour vous rendre la pareille. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Yeni gibiler şirinim." {n}Akciğerlerinin ve boğazının yerindeki, rengi ağarmış {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentasyonu{/g} okşarken kaşıyla ironik bir hareket yapıyor. Âdeta {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}organlarına geri kavuştuğuna{/d} inanamıyor.{/n} "Hayır, gerçekten. Nefes alabiliyorum ve öksürdüğümde artık insanların yüzüne kan sıçratmıyorum. Bana yine büyük iyilik yaptın şirinim. Teşekkürler. Karşılığını vermek için elimden geleni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "Good as new, shereen," {n}Jae says with an ironic quirk of her brow as she rubs the faded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentation{/g} that has replaced her lungs and throat. As if she can't quite believe that it is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeWasInCommoragh}once again part of her body{/d}.{/n} "No, honest. I can breathe and I'm not coughing up blood in people's faces anymore... You did well by me again, shereen. Thank you... I will do my best to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: "Yeni gibiler şirinim." {n}Akciğerlerinin ve boğazının yerini alan rengi ağarmış {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentasyon{/g}u okşarken, kaşıyla ironik bir hareket yapıyor. Onun bir kez daha bedeninin bir parçası olduğuna inanamıyor gibi.{/n} "Hayır, gerçekten. Nefes alabiliyorum ve artık öksürdüğümde insanların yüzüne kan sıçratmıyorum. Bana yine büyük iyilik yaptın şirinim. Teşekkürler. Karşılığını vermek için elimden geleni yapacağım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
